about: hopping your way, comes perhaps i blame the parents records most rockin' release. 'one-legged elvis' ep by the outdoor types here on 5 track cd elsewhere a 2 track 7" vinyl limited to 250 copies. after healthy sales of their album 'all aboard that's coming aboard' earlier this year it's time to grab a beer and a burger to go on a quick pub crawl with the one-legged elvis. a good time is had by all as the band take the leaning king of pizza around some watering holes, where derision is scorned and put in its' place. but wait, we here you cry -"we love it but how can we play it to granny, what with all the rough sailor's language?". worry not - for a pre-watershed 'clean' version is included for the faint of heart. so now you can tell by a simple subtraction that 2 'fuckin's', 2 'motherfuckers' and a 'shit' last 1 second."
title: One Legged Elvis EP

tracks.title: Dont Look for Me, I'm Dead
